name: Graviton - A Relaxing Sand Simulation
description:
Take a little break to relax and draw some sand art.

Graviton is a relaxing sand simulation game in which you draw colored sand and watch it interact with gravity. Once you are done, you can burn it all away.

The purpose of this game is to help you relax for a couple minutes, immerse yourself into the colorful movement of the sand and enjoy playing with the gravity.

FEATURES

  • Draw various types of sand particles to create an immersive sand simulation. Colored sand, blocks, fire and empty
  • Adjust gravity direction and be mesmerized seeing the sand flow on your screen
  • Pull / Push particles with a gravity field to interact with the sand particles to create amazing sand art
  • Set your sand on fire and watch the fire particles spread around
  • Load random image as sand and see the image sand pixels change as they move around
  • Clear your sand painting to start again
